description.zh-cn: 指因年龄或其他因素而结束职业劳动的社会制度。社会人群的普遍化退休是工业化的产物。
description.en: A social system where individuals cease their professional labor due to age or other factors. Widespread retirement among the general population is a product of industrialization.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪至19世纪的工业化进程，是社会人群普遍化退休制度产生的背景。
description.en: The process of industrialization from the 18th to the 19th century, which formed the background for the emergence of widespread retirement systems.

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士王国首相及德意志帝国第一任总理，于1889年设计了现代退休制度。
description.en: Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Prussia and the first Chancellor of the German Empire, who designed the modern retirement system in 1889.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪至20世纪初的德意志国家，现代退休制度在此诞生。
description.en: A German state from the 18th to the early 20th century, where the modern retirement system was born.

description.zh-cn: 北宋官员，曾任陈州郡守，因认为蔡黄裳年纪大而强迫其退休。
description.en: An official of the Northern Song dynasty who served as the prefect of Chenzhou and forced Cai Huangshang to retire due to his old age.

description.zh-cn: 北宋官员，时任录事参军，被陈执中强迫退休。
description.en: An official of the Northern Song dynasty, serving as an administrative assistant, who was forced to retire by Chen Zhizhong.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第五次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第五次全体会议
en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央召开的一次重要会议，会议通过的建议中提出实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄。
description.en: An important meeting of the CPC Central Committee, during which the passed recommendations proposed the implementation of a gradual delay of the statutory retirement age.

nodes.id: 渐进式延迟法定退休年龄

zh-cn: 渐进式延迟法定退休年龄
en: Gradual delay of the statutory retirement age

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应对人口老龄化而提出的一项社会政策改革，旨在逐步提高法定退休年龄。
description.en: A social policy reform proposed by the People's Republic of China in response to population aging, aimed at gradually raising the statutory retirement age.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: “十四五”国家老龄事业发展和养老服务体系规划

zh-cn: “十四五”国家老龄事业发展和养老服务体系规划
en: 14th Five-Year Plan for the Development of National Aging Undertakings and Pension Service System

description.zh-cn: 由中国国务院印发的规划文件，其中提及要实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄。
description.en: A planning document issued by the State Council of China, which mentions the implementation of a gradual delay of the statutory retirement age.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共中央召开的一次重要会议，会议通过的决定中提出应稳妥有序推进渐进式延迟法定退休年龄改革。
description.en: An important meeting of the CPC Central Committee, where the passed decision proposed to steadily and orderly advance the reform of gradually delaying the statutory retirement age.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十四届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 14th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄的决定

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄的决定
国务院关于渐进式延迟法定退休年龄的办法

description.zh-cn: 由第十四届全国人大常委会通过的决定，正式批准并实施中国的延迟退休改革方案。
description.en: A decision passed by the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress, which officially approved and implemented China's delayed retirement reform plan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一项强制性退休储蓄计划。
description.en: A compulsory saving scheme for the retirement of residents in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 工业革命带来的工业化是社会人群普遍化退休的背景条件，改变了以农业为主的经济结构和传统的养老方式。
description.en: The industrialization brought about by the Industrial Revolution was a prerequisite for widespread retirement, changing the agriculture-based economy and traditional ways of supporting the elderly.

description.zh-cn: 为了统一德意志组建德意志帝国而设计了现代退休制度，最初规定雇员在70岁退休。
description.en: Designed the modern retirement system in order to unify Germany and establish the German Empire, initially stipulating retirement for employees at the age of 70.

description.zh-cn: 出任陈州郡守时，以蔡黄裳年纪大为由，威胁并迫使其自请退休。
description.en: While serving as the prefect of Chenzhou, he threatened and forced Cai Huangshang to request retirement, citing his old age.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会第五次全体会议
relationships.target: 渐进式延迟法定退休年龄

description.zh-cn: 会议通过的《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和二〇三五年远景目标的建议》中首次明确提出要实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄。
description.en: The 'Recommendations on Formulating the 14th Five-Year Plan' passed at the meeting explicitly proposed for the first time the implementation of a gradual delay of the statutory retirement age.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: “十四五”国家老龄事业发展和养老服务体系规划

description.zh-cn: 发布《“十四五”国家老龄事业发展和养老服务体系规划的通知》。
description.en: Issued the 'Notice on the 14th Five-Year Plan for the Development of National Aging Undertakings and Pension Service System'.

relationships.source: “十四五”国家老龄事业发展和养老服务体系规划
relationships.target: 渐进式延迟法定退休年龄

description.zh-cn: 该规划中再度提及要实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄。
description.en: This plan reiterated the need to implement a gradual delay of the statutory retirement age.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第三次全体会议
relationships.target: 渐进式延迟法定退休年龄

description.zh-cn: 会议通过的《中共中央关于进一步全面深化改革、推进中国式现代化的决定》中提出应“稳妥有序推进渐进式延迟法定退休年龄改革”。
description.en: The 'Decision on Further Comprehensively Deepening Reform and Advancing Chinese Modernization' passed at the meeting proposed to 'steadily and orderly advance the reform of gradually delaying the statutory retirement age'.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄的决定

description.zh-cn: 其第十一次会议通过了《关于实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄的决定》。
description.en: Its 11th session passed the 'Decision on Implementing the Gradual Delay of the Statutory Retirement Age'.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于实施渐进式延迟法定退休年龄的决定
relationships.target: 渐进式延迟法定退休年龄

description.zh-cn: 该决定的通过标志着中国延迟退休政策的正式落地，规定从2025年起逐步实施。
description.en: The passing of this decision marks the official implementation of China's delayed retirement policy, stipulating a gradual rollout starting in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府于2000年起实施强制性公积金政策。
description.en: The Hong Kong government implemented the Mandatory Provident Fund policy starting from 2000.
